includedAssets.title: Little Green Men
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder and Scully return to rank and file investigations, but, used to extraordinary cases, the agents can't hide their boredom.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mulder and Scully return to rank and file investigations, but, used to extraordinary cases, the agents can't hide their boredom.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder and Scully return to rank and file investigations, but, used to extraordinary cases, the agents can't hide their boredom.

includedAssets.title: The Host
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder pursues a humanoid, parasitic organism that lives in the sewage system.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder pursues a humanoid, parasitic organism that lives in the sewage system.

includedAssets.title: Blood
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate a series of violent killings committed by apparently normal residents of a small town.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate a series of violent killings committed by apparently normal residents of a small town.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate a series of violent killings committed by apparently normal residents of a small town.

includedAssets.title: Sleepless
includedAssets.synopsis: An expert in sleep disorders calls 911 and reports a fire but when the fire crews arrive they find no trace of a fire, just a dead body.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: An expert in sleep disorders calls 911 and reports a fire but when the fire crews arrive they find no trace of a fire, just a dead body.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: An expert in sleep disorders calls 911 and reports a fire but when the fire crews arrive they find no trace of a fire, just a dead body.

includedAssets.title: Duane Barry
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder and Alex Krycek are called in when a psychiatric patient takes his psychologist and three others hostage.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder and Alex Krycek are called in when a psychiatric patient takes his psychologist and three others hostage.

includedAssets.title: Ascension
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder rushes to Scully's apartment when he realises that she has been attacked by Duane Barry, a mental patient and former FBI agent.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mulder rushes to Scully's apartment when he realises that she has been attacked by Duane Barry, a mental patient and former FBI agent.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder rushes to Scully's apartment when he realises that she has been attacked by Duane Barry, a mental patient and former FBI agent.

includedAssets.synopsis: With Scully still missing, Mulder begins work on the newly reopened X-Files project. He links a series of grisly deaths to a group of modern-day vampires.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With Scully still missing, Mulder begins work on the newly reopened X-Files project. He links a series of grisly deaths to modern-day vampires.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With Scully still missing, Mulder begins work on the newly reopened X-Files project. He links a series of grisly deaths to a group of modern-day vampires.

includedAssets.title: One Breath
includedAssets.synopsis: Despite Mulder's objection that it is still too soon to give up hope, Margaret Scully orders a gravestone for her missing daughter, Dana.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Despite Mulder's objection that it is still too soon to give up hope, Margaret Scully orders a gravestone for her missing daughter, Dana.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Despite Mulder's objection that it is still too soon to give up hope, Margaret Scully orders a gravestone for her missing daughter, Dana.

includedAssets.title: Firewalker
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate the mysterious deaths of scientists researching a volcano at Mount Avalon.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate the mysterious deaths of scientists researching a volcano at Mount Avalon.

includedAssets.title: Red Museum
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder and Scully are called to investigate the strange disappearance of a number of teenagers and suspect that a religious cult may be to blame.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder and Scully are called to investigate the strange disappearance of a number of teenagers and suspect that a religious cult may be to blame.

includedAssets.title: Excelsius Dei
includedAssets.synopsis: A nurse working at a convalescent home is violently attacked by an invisible entity and Mulder and Scully are sent to investigate.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A nurse working at a convalescent home is violently attacked by an invisible entity and Mulder and Scully are sent to investigate.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A nurse working at a convalescent home is violently attacked by an invisible entity and Mulder and Scully are sent to investigate.

includedAssets.title: Aubrey
includedAssets.synopsis: A detective's frightening vision leads to the discovery of a murdered FBI agent buried in a shallow grave.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A detective's frightening vision leads to the discovery of a murdered FBI agent buried in a shallow grave.

includedAssets.title: Irresistible

includedAssets.title: Die Hand Die Verletzt

includedAssets.title: Fresh Bones
includedAssets.synopsis: When two Marines die while stationed at a centre for Haitian refugees, Mulder and Scully investigate links to a voodoo curse.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When two Marines die while stationed at a centre for Haitian refugees, Mulder and Scully investigate links to a voodoo curse.

includedAssets.title: End Game (Part 2)

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder attempts to catch a sinister alien bounty hunter, but is soon forced to make an incredibly tough choice.

includedAssets.title: Fearful Symmetry
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder and Scully are sent to investigate when a huge Indian elephant mysteriously runs through the streets of Fairfield, Idaho.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder and Scully are sent to investigate when a huge Indian elephant mysteriously runs through the streets of Fairfield, Idaho.

includedAssets.title: Dod Kalm
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate the sole survivor of an attack on the USS Ardent: a 28-year-old who looks like an elderly man.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate the sole survivor of an attack on the USS Ardent: a 28-year-old who looks like an elderly man.

includedAssets.title: Humbug
includedAssets.synopsis: The agents search for a killer in a Florida town inhabited by side-show performers. Guest starring the real-life circus of Jim Rose.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The agents search for a killer in a Florida town inhabited by side-show performers. Guest starring the real-life circus of Jim Rose.

includedAssets.title: The Calusari
includedAssets.synopsis: The agents investigate a family plagued by several tragic accidents that Mulder speculates are caused by a poltergeist.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The agents investigate a family plagued by several tragic accidents that Mulder speculates are caused by a poltergeist.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The agents investigate a family plagued by several tragic accidents that Mulder speculates are caused by a poltergeist.

includedAssets.title: F. Emasculata
includedAssets.synopsis: As Scully investigates the spread of a deadly contagion at a prison, Mulder tracks down two escaped convicts infected with the disease.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Scully investigates the spread of a deadly contagion at a prison, Mulder tracks down two escaped convicts infected with the disease.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Scully investigates the spread of a deadly contagion at a prison, Mulder tracks down two escaped convicts infected with the disease.

includedAssets.title: Soft Light
includedAssets.synopsis: A scientist experimenting with nuclear technology has an accident which makes his shadow dense - and lethal.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A scientist experimenting with nuclear technology has an accident which makes his shadow dense - and lethal.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A scientist experimenting with nuclear technology has an accident which makes his shadow dense - and lethal.

includedAssets.title: Our Town
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate strange goings on in the town of Dudley, Arkansas when a Federal Poultry Inspector disappears.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate strange goings on in the town of Dudley, Arkansas when a Federal Poultry Inspector disappears.

includedAssets.title: Anasazi
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder is given a coded computer diskette containing information about government officials involved in UFO cover-ups.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder is given a coded computer diskette containing information about government officials involved in UFO cover-ups.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder and Scully are reassigned, but continued strange goings-on put pressure on the FBI to reopen the X-Files and reinstate the detective duo. Second season of the sci-fi drama starring David Duchovny and Gillian Anderson.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Continued strange goings-on push the FBI to reopen the X-Files and restore the reassigned Mulder and Scully. David Duchovny and Gillian Anderson star.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder and Scully are reassigned, but continued strange goings-on put pressure on the FBI to reopen the X-Files and reinstate the detective duo. Second season of the sci-fi drama starring David Duchovny and Gillian Anderson.

includedIn.title: The X-Files
includedIn.synopsis: Sceptic FBI Agent Dana Scully is sent to work on 'The X-Files': investigations into suspected paranormal activity led by Agent Fox Mulder, while an unexplained force works to thwart the duo’s efforts.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Sceptic FBI Agent Dana Scully is sent to work on 'The X-Files': investigations into suspected paranormal activity led by Agent Fox Mulder.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Sceptic FBI Agent Dana Scully is sent to work on 'The X-Files': investigations into suspected paranormal activity led by Agent Fox Mulder, while an unexplained force works to thwart the duo’s efforts.

title: The X-Files Season 2
synopsis: Mulder and Scully are reassigned, but continued strange goings-on put pressure on the FBI to reopen the X-Files and reinstate the detective duo. Second season of the sci-fi drama starring David Duchovny and Gillian Anderson.
shortSynopsis: Continued strange goings-on push the FBI to reopen the X-Files and restore the reassigned Mulder and Scully. David Duchovny and Gillian Anderson star.
mediumSynopsis: Mulder and Scully are reassigned, but continued strange goings-on put pressure on the FBI to reopen the X-Files and reinstate the detective duo. Second season of the sci-fi drama starring David Duchovny and Gillian Anderson.
